social_services.name: Goonj
social_services.description: Goonj focuses on providing clothing, household goods, and other essential items to the needy across India, while also addressing disaster relief and community development.

social_services.name: CRY (Child Rights and You)
social_services.description: CRY works towards ensuring the rights of children in India, focusing on education, healthcare, and protection from exploitation and abuse.

social_services.name: HelpAge India
social_services.description: HelpAge India works for the welfare of elderly people in India, providing healthcare, combating elder abuse, and advocating for their rights.

social_services.name: Smile Foundation
social_services.description: Smile Foundation empowers underprivileged children, youth, and women through education, healthcare, livelihood, and women empowerment programs across India.

social_services.name: Uday Foundation
social_services.description: Uday Foundation works towards the empowerment of underprivileged children and women in India through initiatives focused on education, vocational training, healthcare, and child protection.

healthcare.name: Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF)
healthcare.description: Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) provides medical aid to people affected by conflict, epidemics, disasters, or exclusion from healthcare in India and worldwide.

healthcare.name: Indian Red Cross Society
healthcare.description: The Indian Red Cross Society provides humanitarian aid, disaster relief, and health services across India.

healthcare.name: WaterAid India
healthcare.description: WaterAid India works to provide access to clean water, sanitation, and hygiene for the poorest and most marginalized communities in India.

healthcare.name: UNICEF India
healthcare.description: UNICEF India works to ensure the survival, protection, and development of children in India through various health and nutrition programs.

healthcare.name: MAMTA Health Institute for Mother and Child
healthcare.description: MAMTA Health Institute for Mother and Child works to improve the health and well-being of women and children in underserved communities in India.

education.name: Pratham
education.description: Pratham focuses on improving the quality of education for underprivileged children in India through innovative and scalable interventions.

education.name: Room to Read India
education.description: Room to Read India promotes literacy and a habit of reading among children, and supports girls' education.

human_rights.name: Amnesty International India
human_rights.description: Amnesty International India campaigns for human rights, justice, and equality in India.

human_rights.name: Human Rights Watch
human_rights.description: Human Rights Watch investigates and reports on human rights abuses in India and around the world.
